faqs.question: What if I relapse during the 66 days?
faqs.answer: Your streak resets, but your cumulative progress doesn't. NooLife tracks all completed tasks—if you relapse on Day 30, you've still built 30 days of neural pathways through replacement habits (meditation, cold showers, workouts). Resume immediately with 2 tasks/day. Elite performers bounce back same-day, not 'next Monday.' Progress over perfection.
